label: Emission
comment: Pollution (including noise, heat, and radiation) discharged into the environment by residential, commercial, or industrial facilities or by a means of transport.

datatypeProperties.comment: The affected distance over which this calculated emission is measured.
A measure of the pollution calculated for this emission.
The code specifying the type of this calculated emission.
A weight for which this calculated emission is measured.

referencedBy.comment: A certified level of pollution calculated for an emission from this logistics transport means.
A calculated emission specified for this logistics transport movement.
